page.title: 20The Miners Strike 1984/85
page.content: During the strike my dad went golfing with two of his friends.After the game he went to Broomhill to dig for coal.He took a pick,riddle and some bags.He took the pick to dig a hole to get the coal.The riddle was to sift the rubbish out.He did plenty of gardening for some food.He planted beans,cabbage,carrots and onions. by{Jon Bossons In the strike my dad was angry because he was not getting any strike pay.All his money was being paid to the pickets.Every Sunday we went to my dad's mum for dinner.Before we went home my grandad always gave my dad some money.My dad did not go out.I tried to stop my dad from smoking.My guitar teacher let me have some free lessons. by{John Sykes
